keywords: Reasonableness. -Legitimate Expectations. -Rules of Natural Justice. -Procedure under State Lands (Recovery of Possession) Act to recover vacant possession of a state land. -Forming of opinion by a competent authority. -Meaning of the “Competent Authority”. -Approval of the Minister to issue quit notices. -Legality of the wordings of the Minister’s approval in ejecting occupants.
